column1: #Text=If she had taken Bernie Sanders approach or view to politics in the USA she would have been elected.
#Text=Instead she offered the novelty, not of a new way of doing politics, but of electing a woman to preside over four more years of the status quo.
#Text=Her gender was not enough of a catch to dispel the fear of a lack of substantive change.
#Text=Hopefully the next woman that wants to rise to the top will riding a legitimate wave of real progressive enthusiasm, rather than tired ideas in a pant suit.
